entry.title: ALVA Code published
entry.content:
The Code to ALVA has been published. Check out my Github.

What is ALVA?

ALVA is a novel data augmentation technique, emerged as a focal point in my master’s thesis research. It brings together the power of adversarial attacks and generative networks to go beyond simple pixel fluctuations and create new images.

For more information check out the projects page.
entry.summary: The code to the project ALVA has been published on my Github. Check out the project page as well.
